scripts.build:copy-assets: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distDir = 'dist'; if (!fs.existsSync(distDir)) fs.mkdirSync(distDir, { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync('index.html', path.join(distDir, 'index.html')); fs.copyFileSync('metadata.json', path.join(distDir, 'metadata.json'));"
scripts.build: npm run build:esbuild && npm run build:copy-assets
